channel.title: Posts on Alik's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alik's blog

item.title: Build own drone.io docker image
item.description:
¡Hola, amigos!

In this post, I will quickly descibe how you can build your own drone.io docker image.

item.title: Deploy SPA application to Kubernetes
item.description:
Hello, folks!

Today I want you to share with you tutorial on how to deploy your SPA application to Kubernetes. Tutorial is oriented for those don’t very familiar with docker and k8s but want their single page application run in k8s.

item.title: Tips for language learners
item.description: If you expected only post on IT topics on this blog, I am sorry :( Today I’ll share you my experience in learning a new language. I am practicing these techniques and tips for mastering Español, but I am sure that you can apply them to most of the other languages.

item.title: Oauth2 Proxy for Kubernetes Services
item.description:
Hello, folks!

In this post, I will go through configuring Bitly OAuth2 proxy in a kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Say hello to Hugo
item.description: Today I migrated my blog to Hugo engine. So, it’s my first post here, yaay!

item.title: Go Quickstart
item.description:
Hi folks! It’s been a long time since I have published the last post, but now I came back with short quickstart guide in Go.

In this tutorial, we will configure Go environment in VS Code and write our first program in Go.
